unpublishedAction.name: get_collection_status_data

actionConfiguration.body:
select t1.id, trip_revenue_collection.id as trip_revenue_collection_id, t1.status, trip_revenue_collection.tracking_id, trip_revenue_collection.fleet_tracking_id, t1.collection_amount, t1.created_at as collected_at, shop_id, shop_name, load_point, unload_point, vehicle_number, driver_name, driver_phone, fleet_type, trip_revenue_collection.collection_type, revenue, required_date, additional_fee, trip_revenue_collection.fleet_id, trip_revenue_collection.payment_method, t1.collection_trx_id, t1.collection_remarks from (SELECT * FROM trip_revenue_collection_status where {{showAllCheckbox.isChecked?"status in ('sent-to-finance','settled')":dateRangeDateStartSearch.selectedDate==""?"status in ('sent-to-finance')":"date(created_at+interval '6 hour') between '"+moment(dateRangeDateStartSearch.selectedDate).add('06:00:00').format('YYYY-MM-DD')+"' and '"+moment(dateRangeDateEndSearch.selectedDate).add('06:00:00').format('YYYY-MM-DD')+"' and status in ('sent-to-finance')"}}) t1 
							 join
							 trip_revenue_collection
							 on t1.trip_revenue_collection_id=trip_revenue_collection.id
							 order by 1

jsonPathKeys: showAllCheckbox.isChecked?"status in ('sent-to-finance','settled')":dateRangeDateStartSearch.selectedDate==""?"status in ('sent-to-finance')":"date(created_at+interval '6 hour') between '"+moment(dateRangeDateStartSearch.selectedDate).add('06:00:00').format('YYYY-MM-DD')+"' and '"+moment(dateRangeDateEndSearch.selectedDate).add('06:00:00').format('YYYY-MM-DD')+"' and status in ('sent-to-finance')"
